statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT full_name, dob, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT full_name, dob, medications FROM patient_records WHERE medications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, full_name FROM patient_records ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE next_appointment_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender='M';
SELECT full_name, dob FROM patient_records WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY full_name ASC, dob DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patient_records;
SELECT full_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' AND medications NOT LIKE '%insulin%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT appointment_id, reason, doctor FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT patient_id, name, date_of_birth, medical_history FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE reason LIKE '%checkup%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT doctor, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, doctor ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE address='123 Main St';
SELECT patient_id, address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor_name FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_name='Dr. Smith';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalHistory WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalHistory WHERE record_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-07-15' AND appointment_time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT patient_id, name, date_of_birth, doctor_name FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE patient_id=101 ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor, notes FROM appointments WHERE doctor='Dr. Smith' AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_history WHERE date_of_diagnosis > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor, notes FROM appointments WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT id, name, dob, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, condition, diagnosis FROM medical_history WHERE condition = 'Asthma';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_history INNER JOIN patients ON medical_history.patient_id = patients.id WHERE condition = 'Heart Disease';
SELECT appointment_date, reason, doctor_name FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 3 AND frequency = 'Twice a day';
